TopicTitle: Please move thread back to General Discussion

Articles.Content:
This thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108507-A-Magic-Carpet-Ride

needs moved back to General Discussion, as the point of it is to open discussion in general to ask what kind of crafts should the default Gold 1.0 KSP roll out with - using my shuttle as an example a user-submitted craft for such purpose. It does not belong in Spacecraft Exchange as I already have a formal thread dedicated there to the STS-1 development: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-1-Space-Shuttle-%28NASA-Replica-Easy-to-Load-Fly%29-Full-O-Y-Tanks-to-Orbit-VIDEO-CRAFT

Can you please move http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108507-A-Magic-Carpet-Ride back to General Discussion for the General Discussion feedback on the topic of what crafts should be released for KSP 1.0, namely should Squad consider accepting user-submitted crafts for this purpose?

If folks are sharing their ship designs, whatever the purpose, Spacecraft Exchange is the right place for the thread. If the thread is intended to be a discussion of including player ships in stock, it should have been posted in Suggestions. But since you posted a ship, others would want to post theirs as well, so it's going to end up in Exchange either way.

Edited January 25, 2015 by Vanamonde

This thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108507-A-Magic-Carpet-Ride-%28Should-Squad-Accept-Comunity-Submitted-Crafts-for-KSP-1-0-%29

I want to open up discussion about the Stock craft files, to talk of what crafts should be included, and whether or not Squad should ask for community input on what crafts should be provided in Stock KSP 1.0. This is not a Spacecraft Exchange topic, and though it may ask people to posting craft ideas for Stock KSP, I don't think this kind of discussion belongs in Spacecraft Exchange which is a subforum intended to share crafts not in the game - whereas this topic concerns crafts that are in the game.

I did not provide a craft file in this thread. Please don't put it in Spacecraft Exchange as I want this discussion opened in General Discussion. If you still decide General Discussion is NOT the best place to seek community wide feedback on stock KSP 1.0 craft, then please delete the thread in its entirety from Spacecraft Exchange, as I feel it is not the best forum for it.

inigma, it's a really good craft with a cool vid, I think it'd be a disservice to the community to remove it, and a craft file would be welcome.

You do invite us to fly it, after all:

You are invited to fly her.

I see you added a lot of text about community crafts to the post, maybe in the hope that it'd help add weight to the argument to have the thread moved, regardless, it's a craft thread and it's best placed in the Exchange, but I do strongly suggest you open a thread in Suggestions and Development Discussion regarding your community craft submission idea and link your excellent shuttle to that new thread.

General Discussion is not the place for either thread however
